machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;MachineType:WEEDO F370

;(**** start.gcode for 370 ****)
M203 Z15
M104 S170
G28 ; Home extruder
G29
M107 ; Turn off fan
G90 ; Absolute positioning
M82 ; Extruder in absolute mode
G1 Z20
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position
G1 X140 Y7 Z0.27 F4000
G1 X40 Y7 Z0.27 E25 F1000
G92 E0
M203 Z2

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;(**** end.gcode for F370****)
M203 Z15
G1 X170 Y130 F3000
G92 E0
G1 E-10 F1680
G28 Z F400; Get extruder out of way. Uncomment to use!
M107 ; Turn off fan
M104 T0 S0
G90 ; Absolute positioning
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position
M140 S0 ; Disable heated bed
M84 ; Turn steppers off
